title: Receptionist - ABQ
overview: A Receptionist is needed to manage a high volume of calls and requests from tenants and productions, while also maintaining a warm and friendly atmosphere, organizing supplies, coordinating meals and events, and executing team-building activities for the Netflix Studio Albuquerque Operations Team.
description:
We are seeking a Receptionist to join our growing Studio Management and Services team. This position will be housed in Albuquerque, New Mexico. The position will be responsible for managing a high volume of calls and requests from tenants and productions.

The Opportunity
Netflix is one of the worldâ€™s leading entertainment services with over 238 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

The Role
A successful candidate will be passionate, self-motivated, proactive, quick-thinking, flexible, able to pivot when necessary, thorough and able to manage multiple and diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and unwavering attention to detail at all times. This is a demanding and fast-moving position that requires someone who is a proactive and positive thinker, and able to exercise good judgment and communication.Â

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Welcome visitors in a warm and friendly manner
Manage, track and direct incoming calls
Maintain a safe and tidy reception area and all common lobby areas at all times
Operate standard office equipment on a regular basis, including a copy machine, and a computer
Order, Inventory and Manage office and pantry supplies
Coordinates daily breakfast and lunch meals with caterers for the Netflix Studio Albuquerque Operations Team
Manage lobby Food and Beverage offerings and inventory
Work with Client Services in the coordination of on lot special events
Responsible for creating and executing employee team-building activities
Other tasks as assigned to support the Netflix Studio Albuquerque Operations Team
